metadata.title: CVE-2018-14586 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-624. A SEGV can occur inAP4_Mpeg2TsAudioSampleStream::WriteSample in Core/Ap4Mpeg2Ts.cpp, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2018-14532.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
